TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ComboBoxRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于以视觉样式呈现组合框控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a combo box control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一套`static`可以用于呈现组合框控件使用的操作系统的当前视觉样式的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a combo box control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 这很有用，如果您正在绘制应具有的当前的视觉样式的外观的自定义控件。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要绘制的组合框，使用方法，以便绘制文本框和方法，以便绘制的下拉箭头。To draw a combo box, use the method to draw the text box and the method to draw the drop-down arrow. 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区和将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的组合框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, and will draw the combo box with the current visual style. 否则，这些方法会引发。Otherwise, these methods will throw an . 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，你可以检查的值属性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 此类包装的功能设置为其中一个元素由公开和类。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the and classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的自定义控件和方法来绘制响应鼠标单击的组合框。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the and methods to draw a combo box that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DrawDropDownButton (System.Drawing.Graphics g, System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ComboBoxState state);

.method public static hidebysig void DrawDropDownButton(class System.Drawing.Graphics g, valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ComboBoxState state) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DrawDropDownButton (g As Graphics, bounds As Rectangle, state As ComboBoxState)
public: static void DrawDropDownButton(System::Drawing::Graphics ^ g, System::Drawing::Rectangle bounds, System::Windows::Forms::VisualStyles::ComboBoxState state);

span.span: The used to draw the drop-down arrow.

param.name: bounds
param.span: 用于指定下拉箭头边界的 。

span.span: The that specifies the bounds of the drop-down arrow.

param.name: state
param.span: 值之一，指定下拉箭头的可视状态。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the visual state of the drop-down arrow.

summary.span: 使用操作系统当前视觉样式绘制一个下拉箭头。

span.span: Draws a drop-down arrow with the current visual style of the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法之前，应验证属性返回`true`。Before calling this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用中自定义控件的方法方法，以便绘制鼠标指针的位置确定的状态中的下拉箭头。The following code example uses the method in a custom control's method to draw a drop-down arrow in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#4)]

span.span: Draws a text box with the current visual style of the operating system.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsSupported { get; }
.property bool IsSupported
Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsSupported As Boolean
public: static property bool IsSupported { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可使用 类以视觉样式绘制组合框。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the class can be used to draw a combo box with visual styles.

value.span: 如果用户已在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为`false`、或方法都会引发。If this property is `false`, the or methods will throw an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来确定是否使用方法。The following code example uses the property to determine whether to use the methods. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
